turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello! Would you like to order something today? We have Butter Chicken Grilled Burger and Butter Paneer Grilled Burger. Would you prefer a drink, maybe Cold Coffee or Iced Tea?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Burger. Coke. Done.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cashier: Great choice! A Butter Chicken Grilled Burger and a Coke. Is there anything else you'd like to add, such as McNuggets or a dessert? Your total order includes a Butter Chicken Grilled Burger and a Coke.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Client: No. Done.

turns.speaker: cashier
